definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is proposed for the concealment of confidential information.
sentences.chinese: 基于相似性的搭载模型是实现信息隐蔽的一般框架。

sentences.english: Similarity thinking is a newly growing up branch of the science of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 相似性思维是思维科学新崛起的一个分支。

sentences.english: That similarity must happen at both the package level and the file level.
sentences.chinese: 这种相似性必须同时出现在包级别与文件级别。

sentences.english: The manifestations of the law at different scales exhibit approximate self-similarity. Newton called it 'Nature conformable to Herself.
sentences.chinese: 这些规律的在不同的尺度上显示出自相似性。

sentences.english: Whether perceived similarity will affect empathy is widely drawn attention by psychologists all the while.
sentences.chinese: 感知相似性对共情的影响一直受到心理学家们的关注。

sentences.english: And surveys of NDE accounts show great similarities in the details.
sentences.chinese: NDE表述的调查显示了详细资料的相似性。

sentences.english: Now, to some extent, similarity is hard to pull apart from proximity.
sentences.chinese: 某种程度上，相似性和邻近性是很难区分的。

sentences.english: Finally, sub-block image features are extracted to measure the image similarity.
sentences.chinese: 最后抽取分块图像特征进行图像相似性度量。

sentences.english: The analysis would help us on the carnivalization phenom of net literature and the colour of folklore.
sentences.chinese: 这种狂欢意识与早先的民间文学有很大的相似性。

sentences.english: Now the family resemblance can hardly be traced.
sentences.chinese: 如今这种相似性已是难以找寻了。

sentences.english: Despite differences, all recessions share certain characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 所有的经济衰退在不同之余又存在一定的相似性。

sentences.english: This likeness unquestionably included the ability to engage in intelligible speech via human language.
sentences.chinese: 这种相似性无可非议地包括使用人类的语言的能力。

sentences.english: Mine fault network is a fractal system with statistic self-similarity.
sentences.chinese: 矿井断裂网络是一种具有统计自相似性的分形体系。

sentences.english: There are architectural similarities between Quartz and X11.
Similarity--we like people who are similar to us.
sentences.chinese: 相似性，我们喜欢和自己相似的人。

sentences.english: Darwin argued that this kind of similarity — known as homology — was just a matter of genealogy.
sentences.chinese: 达尔文认为这种相似性是物种之间的宗谱关系的结果。
